title: Upgrades
description: Upgrade your train with the following enhancements:
hull-insufficient: You need to upgrade the train's hull to unlock more enhancements.

damage.name: Damage
damage.description: Increases the damage dealt by the train.

hull.name: Hull
hull.description: Allows you to level up the other train abilities.

fuel-tank.name: Fuel Tank
fuel-tank.description: Increases the train's fuel tank capacity.
